</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 291 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A repair kit allows you to perform simple repairs while traveling. It contains a portable anvil, tongs, woodworking tools, a whetstone, and oils for conditioning leather and wood. You can use a repair kit to [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) items using the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill. You can draw and replace a worn repair kit as part of the action that uses it.
